page.title: 12Southwick Village Activities
page.content: Southwick village has many activities,social clubs and events throughout the local area serving the local community. There is usually some village activity going on most days of the week. On Mondays and Thursdays, in the church hall,there is the karate club,followed on Tuesdays by a "whist drive".{The Southwick Womens Institute meet on Wednesday while the meetings of the{Southwick Friendship {Association}are held on Thursdays The Parish Council hold their own meetings once a month. There are also several annual events held in the village,such as the village carnival which is held every August Bank holiday,occasional art exhibitions of paintings done by villagers, and also Southwick village is annually entered for{"the best kept {village"competition,}a national event.
